title: 18. Estie On the Line: How to Become An Esthetician Influencer, Your Job and Your Parents + Get Out Of Your Head to Master Your FLOW!
description:
Hello roomies! This is another Estie on the Line episode featuring some estie student call ins! We chat:

- how to become an estie influencer + building your social media

- how to explain your job to parents who don't get it + an honest conversation about why it pays to do what you love

- how to master your flow + get out of your head!

Thank you so much to those who called in for this episode!

Check them out on ig:

@venustheesti

@theestheticiantori

@goodfoodnj

Shop my Glymed store:

https://glymedplus.io/store/tessaskin

A big thank you to today's sponsor, Gemmist haircare for my customized hair routine!

Right now my listeners can give Gemmist a try and get 20 percent off  their shampoo & conditioner subscription! Just visit Gemmist.com to  get your personalized recommendation and enter code TREATMENT.

https://gemmist.com/?promo=TREATMENT&utm_source=micropodcast&utm_medium=jaybird&utm_campaign=202102

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:
